Verses: 1 mudhirvayadhullavanaik Kadindhukollaamal, Avanaith Thagappanaippolavum, Paaliya Purusharai Sagodhararaippolavum,
2 mudhirvayadhulla Sthireegalaith Thaaigalaippolavum, Paaliya Sthireegalai Ellaak Karpudan Sagodharigalaippolavum, Paaviththu, Buththisollu.
3 uththama Vidhavaigalaagiya Vidhavaigalaik Ganampannu.

4 vidhavaiyaanavalukkup Pillaigalaavadhu, Peran Perththigalaavadhu Irundhaal, Ivargal Mudhalaavadhu Thangal Sondhak Kudumbaththaith Dhevabakdhiyaai Visaariththu, Petraar Seydha Nanmaigalukkup Badhil Nanmaigalai Seyyak Katrukkollakkadavargal; Adhu Nanmaiyum Dhevanukku Munbaagap Piriyamumaayirukkiradhu.
5 uththama Vidhavaiyaayirundhu Thanimaiyaayirukkiraval Dhevanidaththil Nambikkaiyullavalaai, Iravum Pagalum Venduthalgalilum Jebangalilum Nilaiththiruppaal.
6 sugabogamaai Vaazhgiraval Uyirode Seththaval.
7 avargal Kutranjsaattappadaathavargalaayirukkumpadi Ivaigalaik Kattalaiyidu.
8 oruvan Than Sondha Janangalaiyum, Viseshamaagath Than Veettaaraiyum Visaariyaamarponaal, Avan Visuvaasaththai Marudhaliththavanum, Avisuvaasiyilum Kettavanumaayiruppaan.
9 arubadhu Vayadhukkuk Kuraiyaadhavalum, Ore Purushanukku Manaiviyaayirundhavalumaagi,

10 pillaigalai Valarththu, Anniyarai Ubasariththu, Parisuththavaangaludaiya Kaalgalaik Kazhuvi, Ubaththiravappadugiravargalukku Udhaviseydhu, Sagalavidha Narkiriyaigalaiyum Jaakkiradhaiyaai Nadappiththu, Ivvidhamaai Narkiriyaigalaikkuriththu Narsaatchi Petravalumaayirundhaal, Appadippatta Vidhavaiyaiye Vidhavaigal Koottaththil Serththukkollavendum.
11 ilavayadhulla Vidhavaigalai Adhile Serththukkollaadhe; Enenil, Avargal Kiristhuvukku Virodhamaaik Kaamavigaarankollumpodhu Vivaagampanna Manadhaagi,
12 mudhalil Kondirundha Visuvaasaththai Viduvathinaale, Aakkinaikkutpaduvaargal.

13 adhuvumallaamal, Avargal Sombalullavargalaai, Veeduveedaaith Thiriyappazhaguvaargal; Sombalullavargalaai Maaththiramalla, Alappugiravargalaayum Veenaluvarkaarigalaayum Thagaadha Kaariyangalaip Pesugiravargalaayumiruppaargal.
14 aagaiyaal Ilavayadhulla Vidhavaigal Vivaagampannavum, Pillaigalaip Peravum, Veettai Nadaththavum, Virodhiyaanavan Nindhikkiradharku Idamundaakkaamalirukkavum Vendumendrirukkiren.
15 enenil Idharkumunne Silar Saaththaanaip Pinbatri Vilagipponaargal.

16 visuvaasiyaagiya Oruvanidaththilaavadhu Oruththiyidaththilaavadhu Vidhavaigalirundhaal, Avargal Ivargalukku Udhavi Seyyakkadavargal; Sabaiyaanadhu Uththama Vidhavaigalaanavargalukku Udhaviseyyavendiyadhaagaiyaal Andhap Baaraththai Adhinmel Vaikkakkoodaathu.
17 nandraai Visaaranaiseygira Mooppargalai, Viseshamaaga Thiruvasanaththilum Ubadhesaththilum Pirayaasappadugiravargalai, Rattippaana Ganaththirkup Paaththiraraaga Ennavendum.
18 poradikkira Maattai Vaai Kattaayaaga Endrum, Velaiyaal Than Koolikkup Paaththiranaayirukkiraan Endrum, Vedhavaakkiyam Sollugiradhe.
19 mooppanaanavanukku Virodhamaaga Oruvan Seyyum Piraadhai Irandu Moondru Saatchigal Illaamal Nee Etrukkollakkoodaathu.
20 matravargalukkup Bayamundaagumpadi, Paavanjseydhavargalai Ellaarukkum Munbaagak Kadindhukol.

21 nee Patchapaadhaththode Ondrum Seyyaamalum, Visaarikkumun Nirunayampannaamalum, Ivaigalaik Kaaththu Nadakkumpadi, Dhevanukkum, Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvukkum, Therindhukollappatta Thoodharukkum Munbaaga, Urudhiyaaik Kattalaiyidugiren.
22 oruvanmelum Seekkiramaaik Kaigalai Vaiyaadhe; Matravargal Seyyum Paavangalukkum Udanpadaadhe; Unnai Suththavaanaagak Kaaththukkol.
23 nee Inimel Thanneer Maaththiramkudiyaamal, Un Vayitrirkaagavum, Unakku Adikkadi Neridugira Balaveenangalukkaagavum, Konjam Thiraatcharasamum Koottikkol.
24 silarudaiya Paavangal Veliyarangamaayirundhu, Niyaayaththeerppukku Mundhikkollum; Silarudaiya Paavangal Avargalaip Pindhodarum.
25 appadiye Silarudaiya Narkiriyaigalum Veliyarangamaayirukkum; Appadi Iraadhavaigalum Maraindhirukkamaattaadhu.
